Package gears.sidescroller.world.items

package gears.sidescroller.world.items
This package contains classes relevant to items, which are elements of the game world which a Player can pick up and use. Upon creating new subclasses of AbstractItem, you will need to edit or subclass ItemGenerator to include your new item in randomly generated Areas. You'll also need to include the item in core.ObjectInWorldJson
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractItem
    An AbstractItem represents any pick-up-able item in the game world which a Player can obtain.
    GearItem
    The GearItem is an item which the Player can pick up, then place in their Area as a PlacedGearMachine.
    ItemGenerator
    The ItemGenerator is used to produce random items for randomly generated Areas.
    LanternItem
    a LanternItem can be picked up and provides light
